mapper.select: SELECT DT_INDEX as dtIndex, DT_NO as dtNo, DT_TYPE as dtType, DT_TITLE as dtTitle, DT_MAIN_PHOTO as dtMainPhoto, DT_WRITER_NO as dtWriterNo, DT_SAMMARY AS dtSammary, DT_EXPLAIN as dtExplain, DT_DATE as dtDate, DT_SEE as dtSee, DT_LIKE as dtLike FROM (SELECT DIETTIP_TB.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DT_DATE DESC) AS NUM FROM DIETTIP_TB) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) as totalCount from DIETTIP_TB
